body_html:
Just to follow up on this, as you realized there's no current support for Debug builds using TensorFlow-on-Windows, and the recommended workaround is to use RelWithDebInfo, so that you can use the VS debugger etc.

If anybody wanted to contribute support for the Debug build, that'd be great!
body_text:

body:
Just to follow up on this, as you realized there's no current support for Debug builds using TensorFlow-on-Windows, and the recommended workaround is to use RelWithDebInfo, so that you can use the VS debugger etc.

If anybody wanted to contribute support for the Debug build, that'd be great!
